User Guide for "JUMPY!" Game

Starting the Game

  1. Launching the Game:
    • Start the game by opening the JUMPY!.exe file. The game will display the main menu on the startup screen.
  2. Main Menu:
    • Start: Moves to the level selection screen. After selecting a level, the game transitions into gameplay.
    • Settings: Adjust the volume of music and sound effects.
    • Tutorial: Display basic game controls.
    • Exit: Quit the application.

Player Controls

  • Arrow keys or AD keys: Move the player left/right.
  • Spacebar: Player jump.
  • X or LShift: Perform an attack.

Game Mechanics

  1. Game Objective: Eliminate all enemies on the map. The number of enemies is displayed in the top right corner of the screen.
  2. Progress Through the Game: After eliminating all enemies in a level, the game automatically moves the player to the next level, or if it is the last level, displays the end game screen.
  3. Level Completion: Upon completing the last level, the end game screen appears with an option to return to the main menu.

Death and Hazards

  • Falling off the map
  • Being hit by a fireball from a mage
  • Contact with traps

Game Pause

ESC: Opens the in-game menu with options to continue the game or return to the main menu.

Saving Progress

No Saving: The game does not support saving progress. The game must be completed in one sitting.

Final Notices

Thank you for your interest in JUMPY! We are committed to improving the game and its documentation continuously. Feel free to modify, share, and comment on the game - all feedback is welcome!
